metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15371 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
There is a reachable assertion abort in the function sox_append_comment()in formats.c in Sound eXchange (SoX) 14.4.2. A Crafted input will lead to adenial of service attack during conversion of an audio file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15371` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsox-fmt-all - 14.4.2-3
libsox-fmt-alsa - 14.4.2-3
libsox-fmt-ao - 14.4.2-3
libsox-fmt-base - 14.4.2-3
libsox-fmt-mp3 - 14.4.2-3
libsox-fmt-oss - 14.4.2-3
libsox-fmt-pulse - 14.4.2-3
libsox3 - 14.4.2-3
sox - 14.4.2-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sox package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '14.4.2-3').
